name: places/ChIJzc5lJodZwokRJXDLLTdjR6A
formattedAddress: 85 Delancey St #55, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 85 Delancey St #55, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
The guy Greg - STAY AWAY!
I recently booked a show through his company and I was super excited. Just opened a small venue and got one of my favourite rappers for an amazing price (almost TOO amazing).
After the show sold out the agency (Greg) then turned around and demanded an extra $2000 USD because “management” needed it for travel or they’d cancel the tour. $2k is pretty big when you’ve just opened a small nightclub in the middle of North America. Seeing as it was a sold out show I had to come up with the money.
I thought I was done with the greg fool.  I was not. He then wanted MORE money for transport, added expenses blah blah blah. It came to the point where he was so abusive through emails that we were about to cancel the show until we realized that he was actually pushing us to cancel the show cause he would’ve still got paid (contract)! Greg is a joke! DO NOT WORK with the agency!

originalText.text: Love this agency. Been at this (own a music venue) 20+ years. Greg’s a solid dude.

text.text: Love this agency. Been at this (own a music venue) 20+ years. Greg’s a solid dude.

originalText.text: I have been to Live Musical performance in NYC, Las Vegas and Atlantic City put together by Destination Artist Touring Agency and they have all been Fun and professionally organized.

text.text: I have been to Live Musical performance in NYC, Las Vegas and Atlantic City put together by Destination Artist Touring Agency and they have all been Fun and professionally organized.

originalText.text: Greg is the best in the business. Would recommend as not only a business contact but a friend through business as well!

text.text: Greg is the best in the business. Would recommend as not only a business contact but a friend through business as well!
